title: Cherry and Jicama Salad With Lime and Macadamia Nuts Recipe
full_text:
Cherry and Jicama Salad With Lime and Macadamia Nuts Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/4
pound
red
cherries
(
565
g
), halved and pitted
1
pound
jicama
(from
1
jicama
root
; about
450
g
); peeled and cut into batons
1
small
handful
torn fresh basil leaves
4
ounces
macadamia nuts
(
110
g
), roughly crushed
Zest
of
1
whole
lime
plus fresh
lime juice
to taste (from
1 to 2
whole
limes
)
1
tablespoon
extra virgin olive oil
Kosher salt
Directions
In a large salad or mixing bowl, combine cherries, jicama, basil, and macadamia nuts. Add lime zest and drizzle on just enough olive oil to lightly coat all ingredients. Toss well. Add lime juice to taste (should be bright and tart enough to contrast with the sweet cherries and rich olive oil), tossing well, and season with salt. Serve.
